sentences.en: All the servants had to kowtow to the emperor when he entered the room.
sentences.cn: 皇帝进房间时,所有的仆人都得向他叩首.

sentences.en: Be polite, but don't kowtow to him.
sentences.cn: 对他要有礼貌, 但不要卑躬屈膝.

sentences.en: Be polite, but don't kowtow to him.
sentences.cn: 要有礼貌, 但不要对他卑躬屈节.

sentences.en: I refuse to kowtow to anyone.
I'm not going to kowtow to a mere nobody like him.
sentences.cn: 我不想给他这样的无名小卒磕头.

sentences.en: See how stupidly they kow-tow to persons higher in the hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 瞧他们对上级唯命是从的样子是多么的愚蠢。

sentences.en: The person of Home Chen hellcat kowtow, beg her a heart.
sentences.cn: 陈家的人都围著巫婆磕头, 求她发发慈悲.

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone kowtows to someone else, you are criticizing them because they are too eager to obey or be polite to someone in authority

trans.tran_cn: 叩头，顺从，惟命是从，（对…）卑躬屈膝
